column6: Come on, let's take them down!
Wait, they're not attacking. Hold your fire.
I must say, you've done quite well against my drones.
Allow me to introduce myself.
I am Rudinger. Looking forward to working with you!
YOU'RE the one behind all of this? This is unforgivable!
Hold it Skye.
Rudinger, I am the commander of these forces. We are willing to negotiate.
What are your demands?
Demands...? Eh let me see...
None.
Stop this charade. We are on the brink of breaking through your defences. Now talk.
10 seconds in and I'm already bored. I told you, we have no demands.
Damnit you!
Lieutenant, I don't think he's the kind of guy you can reason with.
I say we break through the ranks and head for Apo!
Ooh, a man of action! Going to break through the ranks, are you?
I'd very much like to see you try that!
Rudinger, enough playing.
You have your orders.
Yes boss.
Suppose I have to stop fooling around then.
All drones, out of the way!
I've been waiting for a good chance to try out this latest tech, actually.
All systems are operational.
Now let's have some fun...  Commence the experiment!
All pilots, spread out!
// Move rudingerShip out of the screen
Drat.
(I did it!)
It's over Rudinger. You missed your chance to negotiate.
You just lost your trump card, and we've got the advantage.
Now surrender!
Heh
Your confidence amuses me, lieutenant.
I admit the tech demo was a failure. And a shame too, that drone had a pretty stable AI.
But that's all it was: an experiment.
I'm afraid this battle has just begun.
Would be fun to play with you a bit more, but...
..the boss needs to finish his work, after all.
Prepare to die!
...We can't break through that.
The last battle weakened us too much.
We'll retreat to the edge of the Asteroid field.
